column1: Check out what I fished up!
Would you like to have a rematch?
Shame, I was really looking forward to fighting you again!
column2: Qué pena, ¡tenía muchas ganas de volver a pelear contigo!

column1: My sailor's pride is at stake!
column2: ¡Mi orgullo de marinero está en juego!

column1: We'll meet again, I'm sure of it!
